author: Aliya Chaudhry
title: How to set up a Slack account
description: Slack, a popular workplace instant-messaging platform, has become even more useful since many offices have switched to working from home in light of COVID-19 self-quarantine procedures. Here’s a guide on how to get Slack up and running.
content:
Slack your co-workers from six feet away or more
Now that were spending more time indoors, were finding new platforms and new ways to use old platforms to stay in touch, whether its for work or with friends. This is the case with Slack, an instant-messaging … [+6041 chars]
